com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics

Class SalesforceAnalyticsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.SalesforceAnalyticsManager

  • public class SalesforceAnalyticsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains APIs that can be used to interact with the SalesforceAnalytics library.
    Author:
    bhariharan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  SalesforceAnalyticsManager.SalesforceAnalyticsPublishingType
      The available Salesforce analytics publishing types.

      • setPublishPeriodicallyFrequencyHours

        public static void setPublishPeriodicallyFrequencyHours(int periodicBackgroundPublishingHoursInterval)
        Sets the interval for periodic background publishing in hours.
        Parameters:
        periodicBackgroundPublishingHoursInterval - The interval for periodic background publishing in hours. It is recommended to keep this value under seven days
        See Also:
        setAnalyticsPublishingType(SalesforceAnalyticsPublishingType)

      • setEventPublishBatchSize

        public static void setEventPublishBatchSize(int batchSize)
        Set the batch size for publishing instrumentation events. Will limit the number of events sent in a single network request to the specified batch size. Will silently return if batch size is less than or equal to zero.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - Event batch size

      • getPublishPeriodicallyFrequencyHours

        public static int getPublishPeriodicallyFrequencyHours()
        Returns the publish frequency currently set, in hours.
        Returns:
        Publish frequency, in hours.

      • enableLogging

        public void enableLogging(boolean enabled)
        Disables or enables logging of events. If logging is disabled, no events will be stored. However, publishing of events is still possible.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True - if logging should be enabled, False - otherwise.

      • updateLoggingPrefs

        public void updateLoggingPrefs()
        Updates the preferences of this library.

      • isLoggingEnabled

        public boolean isLoggingEnabled()
        Returns whether logging is enabled or disabled.
        Returns:
        True - if logging is enabled, False - otherwise.

      • publishAllEvents

        public void publishAllEvents()
        Publishes all stored events to all registered network endpoints after applying the required event format transforms. Stored events will be deleted if publishing was successful for all registered endpoints. This method should NOT be called from the main thread.

      • publishEvents

        public void publishEvents(java.lang.Iterable<InstrumentationEvent> events)
        Publishes a list of events to all registered network endpoints after applying the required event format transforms. Stored events will be deleted if publishing was successful for all registered endpoints. This method should NOT be called from the main thread.
        Parameters:
        events - Iterable of events.

      • publishEvent

        public void publishEvent(InstrumentationEvent event)
        Publishes an event to all registered network endpoints after applying the required event format transforms. Stored event will be deleted if publishing was successful for all registered endpoints. This method should NOT be called from the main thread.
        Parameters:
        event - Event.

      • addRemotePublisher

        public void addRemotePublisher(java.lang.Class<? extends Transform> transformer,
                               java.lang.Class<? extends AnalyticsPublisher> publisher)
        Adds a remote publisher to publish events to.
        Parameters:
        transformer - Transformer class.
        publisher - Publisher class.

        Returns the device app attributes associated with this device.
        Returns:
        Device app attributes.
